subject: Really great EVP's, Bruce!!!
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text: Wow! Bruce, you're getting some awesome EVP's in real-time - answering your questions! I'm thrilled at your progress!            I've gotten some saying my first and some saying my last names!!!! That, convinces me it's not a radio station but actual voices/EVP's!!!                 I just wish I could find some inexpensive amplified speakers for the RS 12-469 I have that could get the volume up (with the speakers I have, I have to turn up the RS Hack volume to max, to hear/record)!  The Philips Sterio speakers at Rite Aid, ($13.) are round for PC, MP3, & CD's it says on the box, I'm wondering IF I should get them to try out?     =Judy=
